Articles.Content: Nice work! i like your mods, they are very detailed, it's cool! can we expect from you soyuz 7k or another soviet space crafts?
Wow, looks great, Zond and Blok D are by far, some of the finer modeling I've seen.
Would you consider doing the Luna 17 Lander with or without Lunakhod would make a nice addition to what you have done already

Would you consider doing the Luna 17 Lander with or without Lunakhod would make a nice addition to what you have done already

hehe, already done first pass, in low quality, but i will rebuild it for more realistic, as more other models. And there are a couple unmanned soviet probes has been done.

but as always the story is following:

one day i typed in one of the forum's topic - there are following outgo of time in my modding timeline: 25% - 3D modeliing, 50% - texturing, 5% -unity, 20% - CFG writing and ingame initial testing. well, i like gametesting and 3D, and may model fast enough, but i do not like texturing work and very bad painter and spend a lot of time to it. And i dunno when i can start LUNA-17-LUNOKHOD texturing.

here are something (soviet only)

(sputnik-1, sputnik-3, luna-2, luna-9, luna-13, luna-17 (lunkhod + stage), venera-3, venera-9 (orbital stage and lander)

bold - are finished models, other - still in progress

Edited July 6, 2014 by DennyTX
Wow! Those models look amazing! And Sputniks? Awesome!

HOLY CRAP check those models out, all your models are textured perfectly so i dont know what your talking about being a bad painter. With the advent of contracts coming the use of unmanned probes is going to be required so if you could get a few of those soviet probes over the finish line that would be awesome. I use your proton a lot by the way its by far my favorite rocket at the moment

Edited July 6, 2014 by Virtualgenius

http://i.imgur.com/0ercy9J.png

Holy. . . It gonna burn my ram.

http://i.imgur.com/0ercy9J.png

This is AMAZING, very good job.
Crap in gonna have to delete my squad an nasa folders, to get these things to work. Not a complaint just an FYI.
With the 64bit version.. I'm going to download.. absolutely.. everything. This here will be spectacular. Thanks for the hard work Denny.
Are yup considering a briz-km for the proton?
How's ze zond goink?

God I didn't expect a Reichtangle here! Should've renamed myself to that, but was too lazy. Damn.

Anyway, just chimed in to say thanks for the great work!

God I didn't expect a Reichtangle here! Should've renamed myself to that, but was too lazy. Damn.

Anyway, just chimed in to say thanks for the great work!

Yuo of knowings polandball... Well... Anschlusszeit...
Is the Zond available for download yet?

Is the Zond available for download yet?

Nein, sadly.

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220464-ussr-proton-8k82k-m

? I wonder it its good to go with .24...

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220464-ussr-proton-8k82k-m

? I wonder it its good to go with .24...

Ja. Ist gut.
Well, it's a part-only mod. It can't really be broken in 0.24 except unbalanced costs.
does this include the Zond?
not yet, IIRC its still a WIP.

Here is my config for OLDD's "Proton-K" for use with RSS+RO+RealFuels+FAR.

All stats adjusted for real-like payload delivering capability (i.e. 20 tonn Mir modules to 350 km orbit).

When using MechJeb, set the appropriate "ascent guidance" values:

altitude 350 km, turn start 1 km, turn end 150 km, turn shape 70%

Feel free to modify, enhance, and to thank author for his work.
I Suggest the Rocket of India the PSLV Rocket ....
Just to let you know, Denny, we're still interested in this. Your Proton is the best out there.
